text: Solve this problem step by step.

Question: A woman needs to transport a fox, a chicken, and a bag of grain across a river.
She has a small boat that can only carry her and one other item at a time.
If left unattended together, the fox will eat the chicken, and the chicken will eat the grain.

How can she transport all three items safely to the other side of the river?

The woman has a small boat that can only carry her and one other item at a time.
